resources.string: The current version is available for Android 10-11 only\n\nPlease use the latest version of the EdXposed
disable digest verify\nallows direct install apps after modify file in apk [ignore invalid digest error]
disable compare signatures\nallow re-install app with different signatures
Detected that you are using a lower version of EdXposed or Unactivated EdXposed, please update or try again after activated
